concept.title: Broadcast-Based Communication
concept.shortdesc: A communication concept where nodes actively broadcast new information when it arrives.

conbody.note: Broadcasts can get received by all other nodes in the system.
conbody.p: Any node actively broadcasts its new information. All other nodes are responsible for intrepreting broadcasted information.

p.note:
Broadcast-Based Communication is comparable to a chat room:
Everyone writes to everyone
It's up to the reader to determine whether a message is important for him/her
